sources.title: How do supply chain disruptions lead to contract disputes?

These disruptions make it hard for companies to meet their contract promises, which often leads to arguments between suppliers and buyers. sources.title: Supply Chain Contracts: Legal Remedies for Breach Disputes
sources.snippet: Supply chain contracts serve as critical frameworks that define the rights and obligations of the involved parties. When breaches occur, several legal remedies are available, including monetary damages and specific performance. Compensatory damages aim to cover actual financial losses, while punitive damages discourage willful misconduct.
